publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: The king's proclamation is dated 8 July 1642.
In this edition there is one line of four small ornaments on title page, and line 1 of text ends "this our".
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and
